channel.title: admin on Juan Jose Cermeño
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Juan Jose Cermeño

item.description: Extremely curious Telecommunications Engineer and passionated Software developer human being, always working on/learning something new. I’m not afraid of failing but not doing it. I really enjoy programming, developing new software, testing from others and build my own. I love science-fiction books and movies, and motorcycles. Ruby on Rails lover (intranet web applications and cloud web applications), full stack but backend oriented lately. I’ve work with Rspec, Sidekiq, AWS ELB, Heroku, Redis, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Jenkins, CircleCI, Docker and many many more frameworks and technologies.
